SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

net.rim.blackberry.api.mail
Interface Message.Status

Enclosing class:
Message
public static interface Message.Status

Defines the status options supported by the Message class.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 3.6.0

Field Summary
static int RX_ERROR
          Indicates an error occurred when receiving a message.
static int RX_RECEIVED
          Indicates the message has been received successfully.
static int RX_RECEIVING
          Indicates the message is being received.
static int TX_COMPOSING
          Indicates the message is being composed.
static int TX_COMPRESSING
          Indicates the message is being compressed.
static int TX_DELIVERED
          Indicates the message has been delivered successfully.
static int TX_ENCRYPTING
          Indicates the message is being encrypted.
static int TX_ERROR
          Indicates a tranmission error.
static int TX_GENERAL_FAILURE
          Indicates a general transmission failure.
static int TX_MAILBOXED
          Indicates the sent message has been filed in the mailbox.
static int TX_PENDING
          Indicates message transmission is pending.
static int TX_READ
          Indicates the message has been read.
static int TX_RETRIEVING_KEY
          Indicates the key is being retrieved for the message.
static int TX_SENDING
          Indicates the message is being sent.
static int TX_SENT
          Indicates the message has been sent.
